featured.text: The key to the city he received from the mayor. 53.

The mayor said new buildings would be illuminated, notably along the banks of the Seine, which would become a luminous strip, while Notre Dame Cathedral would be lit from the inside to show off its stained glass windows.
At City Hall, Mayor Abraham Beame hosted a news conference that turned into a ceremony in George Willig's honor.
Three people are running for mayor.

other.text: Interviewer: You’re the older brother of Rahm, the mayor of Chicago, and Ari, an extremely successful talent agent.
Rahm would still be mayor of Chicago.
According to Mayor Tiberi, Paris will be decorated mostly by .

definition.zh_def: 市長，城市或市鎮的首長，負責行政管理和公共事務。
definition.en_def: The elected head of a city, town, or municipality, responsible for its administration and public affairs.
definition.example: The mayor announced new plans to improve public transportation in the city.
